name: avodocs
description: Official Manual for the Avolites Titan software
author: Avolites Ltd. <support@avolites.com> (https://www.avolites.com)

scripts.build: node ../parse/search.js && node-sass scss/custom.scss static/custom.css --output-style expanded && docusaurus-build && npm run og
scripts.sass: node-sass scss/custom.scss static/custom.css --output-style expanded && node-sass --watch scss/custom.scss static/custom.css --output-style expanded
scripts.app-sass: node-sass app/scss/ -o app/sources/local/ --output-style compressed && node-sass --watch app/scss/ -o app/sources/local/ --output-style compressed
scripts.app-pre-build: npm run build && node-sass app/scss/ -o app/sources/local/ --output-style compressed
scripts.app-build: npm run app-pre-build && npm run app-build-no-pre
scripts.app-build-all: npm run app-pre-build && npm run app-build-all-no-pre
